newsitem.title: ITALY: MOTOR RACING-SENNA TRIAL ADJOURNED UNTIL FEB 28.
newsitem.headline: MOTOR RACING-SENNA TRIAL ADJOURNED UNTIL FEB 28.

text.p: The trial of Formula One team chief Frank Williams and five others accused of manslaughter over the death of three times world champion Ayrton Senna was adjourned on Thursday until February 28.

The trial, which opened on Thursday to consider legal preliminaries, will resume on February 28 when the presiding judge will rule on various defence requests to limit evidence. The prosecution presents its case on March 5, with the first witness to testify on March 12.
